LanguageData.HRSettingNeedsTitle: Block hunting when under the following need levels
LanguageData.CantHuntDangerousTarget: target too dangerous for sleeping execution
LanguageData.HRTooltipShouldCollectExplodables: Uncheck to have hunter leave boomalopes or boomrats to burn. Check to have hunters collect corpses despite risk.
LanguageData.HRSettingShouldMeleeHuntBigGame: Allow hunting big game with melee weapons
LanguageData.HRSettingShouldMeleeHuntMediumGame: Allow hunting medium game with melee weapons
LanguageData.HRSettingShouldMeleeHuntSmallGame: Allow hunting small game with melee weapons
LanguageData.HRSettingShouldApprochSleepers: Move in close on sleeping animals
LanguageData.CantHuntPredatorsNotEnabled: target is a predator and not enabled for hunting
LanguageData.CantHuntMeleeNotEnabled: target not enabled for melee hunting
